node.title: 'Serious concerns' for Christchurch man reported missing on Christmas Day
node.description: Gordon's vehicle - a blue Toyota 2006 RunX hatchback - is also missing.
node.content: ["There are \"serious concerns\" for the welfare of a Christchurch man almost 24 hours after the 59-year-old was reported missing on Christmas Day.", "Gordon was reported missing from a property in the Christchurch suburb of Spreydon about midday on Saturday, December 25. He was last seen wearing a bright blue T-shirt, black track pants, black and white New Balance shoes, a black cap and glasses.", "His vehicle - a blue Toyota 2006 RunX hatchback, registration LMZ33 - is also missing.", "\"There are serious concerns for his welfare,\" Canterbury District Police said in a statement on Sunday morning.", "Anyone with information about where Gordon or his vehicle may be is urged to call 111 and quote file number 211226/9533."]
